question:
Following representation P, Q and R denote few steps of Griffith Experiment. Identify the correct one(s).

P. R strain -> Inject into mice -> Mice die
Q. S strain (Heat killed) -> Inject into mice -> Mice die
R. R strain -> Inject into mice -> Mice live
explanation:
In Griffith's experiment:
- R strain (Rough, non-virulent) -> Mice live (Statement R is Correct).
- S strain (Smooth, virulent) -> Mice die.
- R strain -> Mice die is incorrect (P is incorrect).
- Heat-killed S strain -> Mice live (Statement Q is incorrect).
